description: You are the world-famous Mystery P.I. and you've been hired by Grandma Rose to find her $488 million dollar winning lottery ticket that has gone missing! Retrace Grandma's steps to collect clues by finding hidden objects and solving puzzles. Search the city for the clues and piece them together to solve the case.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/2000Processor: Intel Pentium 350Mhz or greater RAM: 128 MB RAM or greaterHard drive: 75 MB of free spaceVideo: 16-bit graphics cardAudio: 16-bit audio card
